mapper.select: select seq, subject, writer, date_format(wdate,'%Y-%m-%d') wdate, hit, datediff(now(), wdate) wgap from board1 order by seq desc
mapper.update: update board1 set hit=hit+1 where seq=#{seq}
update board1 set subject = #{subject}, mail=#{mail}, content=#{content} where seq=#{seq} and password=#{password}
mapper.delete: delete from board1 where seq=#{seq} and password=#{password}
